name: 8BEAT (Keiro)
description:
8BEAT is a simple mobile game for Android & Windows.

Using buttons, match color of the portal to falling blobs. Allow them conquer the unknown universe they're going into.

Controls on PC:
Use mouse or keyboard:
Left arrow - Red button
Down arrow - Green button
Right arrow - Blue button

Music by Matik
wochen.mateusz@gmail.com
